ui

Class HomeWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • ui.HomeWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, ReloadableNode

    public class HomeWindow
extends javafx.stage.Stage
implements ReloadableNode
    Main window for the application. Creates a BorderPane that includes:
    A menu at the top
    A tabbed window in the middle
    A status bar at the bottom
    Author:
    Manuel Colorado
